autonomous_agent_apis.name: Microsoft Bot Framework
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Microsoft's comprehensive platform for building, deploying, and managing conversational AI agents and chatbots across multiple channels, with robust REST APIs and enterprise-grade features.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: IBM Watson Assistant
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Enterprise-grade conversational AI and virtual agent platform with REST APIs, SDKs, and advanced dialog orchestration. Supports secure, scalable deployments for regulated industries.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Google Dialogflow
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Google's cloud-based conversational AI platform for building agents, chatbots, and voice apps. Offers REST APIs, CX and ES editions, and deep integration with Google Cloud.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Thoughtful AI Agents for Healthcare
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Production-ready healthcare AI agents for revenue cycle management, eligibility, claims, and payment automation. Integrates with EHRs and payer portals.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Rhapsody API Guardian
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Healthcare-focused API gateway and agentic platform enabling secure, real-time interoperability and AI agent integration with FHIR-ready APIs.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Hippocratic AI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Enterprise-grade generative AI agents for healthcare, focused on safety, compliance, and operational automation. Trusted by major healthcare organizations.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: APIDNA Autonomous AI Agent Platform
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Fintech and enterprise platform for seamless, secure, and automated API integrations using autonomous AI agents. Designed for complex, production-grade workflows.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Chimoney Fintech Agent API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: API platform for instant agent wallet creation, multi-rail payments, and global fintech automation. Supports agent-based payment flows and compliance.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Upsonic AI Agent Framework
autonomous_agent_apis.description: AI agent platform for automating complex fintech operations, including merchant onboarding, AML checks, and risk assessment. Provides production-ready APIs.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Retell AI Voice Agent Platform
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Production-ready AI voice agents for phone call automation in retail and customer service. Offers scalable API and platform for deployment and monitoring.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Sendbird AI Agent API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: API suite for integrating AI agents into retail and messaging workflows, enabling inventory checks, CRM updates, and automated customer interactions.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Camunda AI Agent Orchestration
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Enterprise-grade agent orchestration and automation platform, combining AI autonomy with business process management. Supports REST API integration for production systems.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Azure Agent Factory
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Microsoft Azure's platform for rapid development and deployment of production-ready AI agents, supporting REST API exposure, multi-agent orchestration, and integration with Logic Apps.

search_queries: autonomous agent REST API production ready
